0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='senara'>Senara</phoneme> & <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='himaya'>Himaya</phoneme>: We'll do it.</prosody></speak>

1.text: Aunt Minoli : I'll dice the tomatoes and chop the garlic.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Aunt <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='minoli'>Minoli</phoneme> : I'll dice the tomatoes and chop the garlic.</prosody></speak>

2.text: Lakshitha : Shall I light the fire?
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lakʃit̪a'>Lakshitha</phoneme> : Shall I light the fire?</prosody></speak>

3.text: Aunt Minoli : Alright. Now add the vegetables and pour some water into the pot. Now put the other ingredients and let it boil.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Aunt <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='minoli'>Minoli</phoneme> : Alright. Now add the vegetables and pour some water into the pot. Now put the other ingredients and let it boil.</prosody></speak>

4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='senara'>Senara</phoneme> : Mmmmm…….It smells good.</prosody></speak>

5.text: Aunt Minoli : Oh! Himaya, add a pinch of salt and pepper and put off the fire, please.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Aunt <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='minoli'>Minoli</phoneme> : Oh! <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='himaya'>Himaya</phoneme>, add a pinch of salt and pepper and put off the fire, please.</prosody></speak>

6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='himaya'>Himaya</phoneme> : Alright. I'll do it.</prosody></speak>

7.text: Aunt Minoli : Let's have dinner. Lakshita, can you please lay the table?
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Aunt <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='minoli'>Minoli</phoneme> : Let's have dinner. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lakʃit̪a'>Lakshita</phoneme>, can you please lay the table?</prosody></speak>

10.text: Here are the steps to make a soup. Read and match the pictures.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Here are the steps to make a soup. Read and match the pictures.</prosody></speak>

11.text: a. Wash the vegetables. b. Cut the vegetables into small pieces. c. Put them into a pan and add water. d. Add some pepper, salt and then cook. e. Now let's enjoy the soup.
11.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>a. Wash the vegetables. b. Cut the vegetables into small pieces. c. Put them into a pan and add water. d. Add some pepper, salt and then cook. e. Now let's enjoy the soup.</prosody></speak>
